titles.title: An original resolution relating to the purchase of calendars.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 465.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/15/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to expend a specified amount for the purchase of 1995 "We The People" calendars.
